backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining state maps for companies, reviews, user profiles, official requests/responses, payments, suggestions, and related types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file mapping product requirements to affected files, components, and tests for robots.txt and sitemap.xml.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptions of various frontend files and components for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document with metadata, canonical tags, favicon, and app bootstrap script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawling and pointing to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing the homepage with metadata like lastmod and priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, user context, authentication, navigation, and modal visibility.
Scroll-dependent button that appears after scrolling and smoothly returns the user to the top.
frontend/src/components/CompanyCreationM: Modal for admins to create companies with fields for categories and Bulgarian cities, using query hooks for submission.
A form component for editing company details, including category and city selection, using useEditCompany. Handles form submission, validation, and UI interactions.
frontend/src/components/CompanyEditHisto: Displays a compact or full list of company edit history entries with formatted metadata and a modal for viewing details. Supports toggling history visibility and selecting specific edits.
Renders a chronological timeline of company edits with sortable entries and a detail modal. Shows timestamps, editors, reasons, and summaries of changed fields.
frontend/src/components/EditDetailsModal: A modal presenting detailed information about a specific company edit, including fields changed, timestamps, and editor data. Supports backdrop close and formatted field rendering.
frontend/src/components/EvidenceModal.ts: Displays evidence files (PDF, images, audio, video) with preview, open-in-new-tab, and download options. Fetches file URLs and handles type-specific rendering.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A login/logout button integrating Internet Identity authentication with React Query cache clearing. Shows status-aware labels and handles auto-recovery for duplicate authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile navigation menu that shows page links and a dynamic CTA button based on user role and employer request status.
frontend/src/components/MultipleEvidence: Modal for previewing, navigating, and downloading multiple evidence files with file-type detection.
frontend/src/components/OfficialProfileR: Form modal allowing users to submit an official profile request with validation, file upload, and company auto-suggestions.
frontend/src/components/OfficialResponse: Displays a timeline of official response edits with timestamps, editor info, change summaries, and a detail modal.
Modal for creating or editing an official response, supporting text input, file uploads, and mode-based behavior.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Shows the user's official profile request status with different messages for pending, approved, or rejected states.
frontend/src/components/RatingDisplay.ts: Displays star ratings with optional label, value, and review count using dynamic sizes.
frontend/src/components/RatingInput.tsx: Interactive 1–5 star rating input with label, required marker, and optional hint.
frontend/src/components/RejectionNotific: Shows a dismissible rejection banner with expandable details and a button to view the reason.
frontend/src/components/RejectionReasonM: Modal that displays the rejection reason text with close controls.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSubmission: Modal for submitting company reviews with multiple ratings, text, file uploads, and validation.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionModa: Displays subscription plan details, pricing, and a warning about unconfigured Stripe payments.
Modal for submitting suggestions with title and content, including validation and success state.
frontend/src/config/subscriptionPlans.ts: Defines subscription plan configs and helper functions for retrieving plans and formatting prices.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvidenceArchiveDow: Provides a hook for downloading multiple evidence files as a ZIP, plus a helper for resolving file URLs; current implementation requires a component to supply resolved URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePdfObjectUrl.ts: Fetches a remote PDF and returns a blob URL for inline viewing, with loading and error states and cleanup handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user context, admin checks, companies, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining themes, typography, utilities, animations, and layout behaviors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin UI for managing official profile requests with file previews, actions, filtering, and navigation.
Admin page enabling viewing, filtering, searching, and updating suggestion statuses with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/BlockchainPage.tsx: Static informational page explaining how Verithos uses blockchain and ICP for immutability, security, and timestamped records.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyPage.tsx: Company detail page showing reviews, evidence, statistics, edit history, and official responses with extensive filtering and actions.
frontend/src/pages/EmployersPage.tsx: Employers listing page with sorting, filtering, sector categories, company creation, and navigation to company details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, manifesto, and navigation to employers, enforcing scroll-to-top behavior on load.
frontend/src/pages/MyOfficialProfilePage: Page component showing a user's official company profile with data fetching, metrics, subscription controls, and related modals.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry or return to the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a successful payment confirmation and navigation options back to the profile or home page.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Renders the platform’s privacy policy with navigation back to the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the terms of use, outlining rules and responsibilities for platform usage.
frontend/src/utils/cityData.ts: Exports a large list of Bulgarian city names for use in forms or selection inputs.
frontend/src/utils/evidenceArchiveDownlo: Utility to create ZIP archives from evidence files using pre-resolved URLs, handling success and failure tracking.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides helpers for formatting dates, file sizes, blockchain hashes, URLs, EIK values, and file types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Implements validation for files, ratings, and company data including size, type, and required fields.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, theming, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, SEO file requirements, and pending feature requests for robots.txt and sitemap.xml.
